body_html:
I think you basically need to do something along the lines of:

if hasattr(arr, "__len__") and len(arr)<=8:
  for i in range(len(arr)):
    arr[i] = int(arr[i]) if instanceof(arr[i], Dimension) else arr[i]

And then run the tests and see if something breaks. The len restriction is because this only really matters for shapes and TF has rank limit of 8
body:
I think you basically need to do something along the lines of:

```
if hasattr(arr, "__len__") and len(arr)<=8:
  for i in range(len(arr)):
    arr[i] = int(arr[i]) if instanceof(arr[i], Dimension) else arr[i]
```
And then run the tests and see if something breaks. The `len` restriction is because this only really matters for shapes and TF has rank limit of 8
